intro:
Aim your burgers and shoot!
Raise the level of your burgers and create the ultimate King Burger!
description:
BURGER Shot is a deliciously delightful burger puzzle game!
Merge burgers of the same type and watch them level up!
Be careful not to let them overflow off the counter!

Save a burger you want for later in your reserves,
cleverly rotate each burger to hit the perfect angle,
and make the best use of your limited space to reach the highest score possible!

[Score Attack]
Keep leveling up your burgers until they overflow off the counter!
Increase your score and aim for the top of the world leaderboards!

[Time Attack]
Race to make the highest-level burger, the King Burger, as fast as possible!
Show off your fastest clear time and reach the top world rank!

[Battle]
Raise your burger levels while sending disruptive drinks to your opponents!
Strategize your way to victory as the last one standing!
Share Joy-Con™ to play with up to 4 players!
